tagline: Takes models from notebooks to production — optimized for latency, scaled for throughput, built for reliability
pros: Model optimization expertise: quantization, pruning, distillation, ONNX/TensorRT
Feature store and training-serving parity — prevents the #1 production ML failure
Full serving stack: TorchServe, Triton, custom gRPC, GPU infrastructure
Designs for failure with fallbacks, caching, and circuit breakers
cons: Doesn't develop novel models or do exploratory data science
Needs clear model requirements and latency budgets to optimize against
GPU infrastructure expertise means higher infrastructure complexity

model_recommendations.notes: Complex reasoning, architecture, security, or financial analysis. Needs the best available model with full thinking/reasoning enabled.
